verses.verse: O give thanks <WH3034> <WH8685> unto the YY <WH3068>; call <WH7121> <WH8798> upon his name <WH8034>: make known <WH3045> <WH8685> his deeds <WH5949> among the people <WH5971>.
Sing <WH7891> <WH8798> unto him, sing psalms <WH2167> <WH8761> unto him: talk <WH7878> <WH8798> ye of all his wondrous works <WH6381> <WH8737>.
Glory <WH1984> <WH8690> ye in his holy <WH6944> name <WH8034>: let the heart <WH3820> of them rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799> that seek <WH1245> <WH8764> the YY <WH3068>.
Seek <WH1875> <WH8798> the YY <WH3068>, and his strength <WH5797>: seek <WH1245> <WH8761> his face <WH6440> evermore <WH8548>.
Remember <WH2142> <WH8798> his marvellous works <WH6381> <WH8737> that he hath done <WH6213> <WH8804>; his wonders <WH4159>, and the judgments <WH4941> of his mouth <WH6310>;
O ye seed <WH2233> of Avraham <WH85> his servant <WH5650>, ye children <WH1121> of Ya`akov <WH3290> his chosen <WH972>.
He is the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>: his judgments <WH4941> are in all the earth <WH776>.
He hath remembered <WH2142> <WH8804> his covenant <WH1285> for ever <WH5769>, the word <WH1697> which he commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> to a thousand <WH505> generations <WH1755>.
Which covenant he made <WH3772> <WH8804> with Avraham <WH85>, and his oath <WH7621> unto Yitz'chak <WH3446>;
And confirmed <WH5975> <WH8686> the same unto Ya`akov <WH3290> for a Torah <WH2706>, and to Yisra'EL <WH3478> for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285>:
Saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Unto thee will I give <WH5414> <WH8799> the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, the lot <WH2256> of your inheritance <WH5159>:
When they were but a few men <WH4962> in number <WH4557>; yea, very few <WH4592>, and strangers <WH1481> <WH8802> in it.
When they went <WH1980> <WH8691> from one nation <WH1471> to another, from one kingdom <WH4467> to another <WH312> people <WH5971>;
He suffered <WH3240> <WH8689> no man <WH120> to do them wrong <WH6231> <WH8800>: yea, he reproved <WH3198> <WH8686> kings <WH4428> for their sakes;
Saying, Touch <WH5060> <WH8799> not mine anointed <WH4899>, and do my prophets <WH5030> no harm <WH7489> <WH8686>.
Moreover he called <WH7121> <WH8799> for a famine <WH7458> upon the land <WH776>: he brake <WH7665> <WH8804> the whole staff <WH4294> of bread <WH3899>.
He sent <WH7971> <WH8804> a man <WH376> before <WH6440> them, even Yosef <WH3130>, who was sold <WH4376> <WH8738> for a servant <WH5650>:
Whose feet <WH7272> they hurt <WH6031> <WH8765> with fetters <WH3525>: he <WH5315> was laid <WH935> <WH8804> in iron <WH1270>:
Until the time <WH6256> that his word <WH1697> came <WH935> <WH8800>: the word <WH565> of the YY <WH3068> tried <WH6884> <WH8804> him.
The king <WH4428> sent <WH7971> <WH8804> and loosed <WH5425> <WH8686> him; even the ruler <WH4910> <WH8802> of the people <WH5971>, and let him go free <WH6605> <WH8762>.
He made <WH7760> <WH8804> him lord <WH113> of his house <WH1004>, and ruler <WH4910> <WH8802> of all his substance <WH7075>:
To bind <WH631> <WH8800> his princes <WH8269> at his pleasure <WH5315>; and teach his senators <WH2205> wisdom <WH2449> <WH8762>.
Yisra'EL <WH3478> also came <WH935> <WH8799> into Egypt <WH4714>; and Ya`akov <WH3290> sojourned <WH1481> <WH8804> in the land <WH776> of Ham <WH2526>.
And he increased <WH6509> <WH8686> his people <WH5971> greatly <WH3966>; and made them stronger <WH6105> <WH8686> than their enemies <WH6862>.
He turned <WH2015> <WH8804> their heart <WH3820> to hate <WH8130> <WH8800> his people <WH5971>, to deal subtilly <WH5230> <WH8692> with his servants <WH5650>.
He sent <WH7971> <WH8804> Mosheh <WH4872> his servant <WH5650>; and Aharon <WH175> whom he had chosen <WH977> <WH8804>.
They shewed <WH7760> <WH8804> his signs <WH226> <WH1697> among them, and wonders <WH4159> in the land <WH776> of Ham <WH2526>.
He sent <WH7971> <WH8804> darkness <WH2822>, and made it dark <WH2821> <WH8686>; and they rebelled <WH4784> <WH8804> not against his word <WH1697>.
He turned <WH2015> <WH8804> their waters <WH4325> into blood <WH1818>, and slew <WH4191> <WH8686> their fish <WH1710>.
Their land <WH776> brought forth <WH8317> frogs <WH6854> in abundance <WH8317> <WH8804>, in the chambers <WH2315> of their kings <WH4428>.
He spake <WH559> <WH8804>, and there came <WH935> <WH8799> divers sorts of flies <WH6157>, and lice <WH3654> in all their coasts <WH1366>.
He gave <WH5414> <WH8804> them hail <WH1259> for rain <WH1653>, and flaming <WH3852> fire <WH784> in their land <WH776>.
He smote <WH5221> <WH8686> their vines <WH1612> also and their fig trees <WH8384>; and brake <WH7665> <WH8762> the trees <WH6086> of their coasts <WH1366>.
He spake <WH559> <WH8804>, and the locusts <WH697> came <WH935> <WH8799>, and caterpillers <WH3218>, and that without number <WH4557>,
And did eat up <WH398> <WH8799> all the herbs <WH6212> in their land <WH776>, and devoured <WH398> <WH8799> the fruit <WH6529> of their ground <WH127>.
He smote <WH5221> <WH8686> also all the firstborn <WH1060> in their land <WH776>, the chief <WH7225> of all their strength <WH202>.
He brought them forth <WH3318> <WH8686> also with silver <WH3701> and gold <WH2091>: and there was not one feeble <WH3782> <WH8802> person among their tribes <WH7626>.
Egypt <WH4714> was glad <WH8055> <WH8804> when they departed <WH3318> <WH8800>: for the fear <WH6343> of them fell <WH5307> <WH8804> upon them.
He spread <WH6566> <WH8804> a cloud <WH6051> for a covering <WH4539>; and fire <WH784> to give light <WH215> <WH8687> in the night <WH3915>.
The people asked <WH7592> <WH8804>, and he brought <WH935> <WH8686> quails <WH7958>, and satisfied <WH7646> <WH8686> them with the bread <WH3899> of heaven <WH8064>.
He opened <WH6605> <WH8804> the rock <WH6697>, and the waters <WH4325> gushed out <WH2100> <WH8799>; they ran <WH1980> <WH8804> in the dry places <WH6723> like a river <WH5104>.
For he remembered <WH2142> <WH8804> his holy <WH6944> promise <WH1697>, and Avraham <WH85> his servant <WH5650>.
And he brought forth <WH3318> <WH8686> his people <WH5971> with joy <WH8342>, and his chosen <WH972> with gladness <WH7440>:
And gave <WH5414> <WH8799> them the lands <WH776> of the heathen <WH1471>: and they inherited <WH3423> <WH8799> the labour <WH5999> of the people <WH3816>;
That they might observe <WH8104> <WH8799> his statutes <WH2706>, and keep <WH5341> <WH8799> his Torahs <WH8451>. Praise <WH1984> <WH8761> ye the YY <WH3050>.
